messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Davinci. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I'm Julia. I'm really confused about a recent bill I received for Nespresso Coffee Capsules.
Hi Julia, thank you for providing your name. I’m here to help. Could you please provide more details about the confusion with your bill?
Sure, I received a bill that seems much higher than usual, but I don't understand why. I only ordered my regular Nespresso Coffee Capsules.
I understand, Julia. Let me pull up your account details to review your recent orders and billing. Please hold on for a moment.
Thank you for waiting, Julia. I see that there was an additional charge for expedited shipping on your last order. Does that sound familiar to you?
No, I didn't choose expedited shipping. I always select standard shipping.

I see. It appears that there might have been an error. Let me go ahead and correct this for you. I will remove the expedited shipping charge from your bill. You should see the adjustment reflected in your account within the next 24 hours.
Thank you. I appreciate your help. I was really worried there for a moment.
You’re welcome, Julia. Is there anything else I can assist you with regarding your Nespresso Coffee Capsules or any other concerns?
No, that's all for now. Thanks again!
My pleasure, Julia. Have a great day!
